Value.label: Basic Set Command
Value.Help:
Set Basic Set Command value to be sent to group 2 when switch is turned on.
When the physical button on the mini-plug is used to turn OFF the switch the value "0" will always be sent to group 2, however this is not the case when the switch is turned off remotely.

Value.label: Delay
Value.Help: The delaying time to report to Group 1

Value.label: Remember Last
Value.Help: Remember the last status on plug

Value.label: Wattage Auto Report
Value.Help: Set the interval for wattage auto report (0 = disabled)

Value.label: Energy Auto report
Value.Help: Set the interval for kWh auto report (0 = disabled)

Value.label: Value of Wattage surpassed
Value.Help: Auto report is sent when load surpasses the set value of wattage (0 = disabled)

Value.label: Change of Wattage surpassed
Value.Help: Auto report is sent when the change of wattage surpasses the set percentage (0 = disabled)
